Title: How To Make Your Life Easier ï½œ Tao Te Ching Chapter 63 Explained
Content: Embrace a mindset of 'non-action' (wu-wei) to manage overwhelming tasks.
Challenge common assumptions about how tasks should be approached.
Start with the simplest step towards a complex task and build from there.
Be open to adapting to new methods or 'metas' when traditional approaches don't work.
Understand that perfection is not the goal; progress is.
